availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hannah A. Carrick (Crittenden County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Samuel J. Carrick in Crittenden County, Kentucky, on May 16, 1852. Mother of Rebecca L. Carrick and Ewell A. Carrick. Resident in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 432.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, Bells Mines, p. 98A.
